for_aceTheDactyl.note: These bridge maps show how SACS connects to its component systems. Each bridge has been validated and sealed. You can use these as templates when creating your own VaultNode bridges.
usage_tips: Study the HTL sentences to understand bridge patterns
Notice how layouts (linear/spiral/knot/mirrored) match relationship types
Observe metric values - these are targets for your bridges
Gate sequences show typical patterns for different bridge types
Witness roles indicate which agent validates what

your_first_bridge.suggestion: Start simple with linear layout and flexible consent
